InvalidCommand: ERROR: I dont know that command.
NoCommandSelected: ERROR: No command was selected, try using `*runescape help` if unsure
NoArgumentGiven: ERROR: No argument was given with your command selection
InvalidMaterialName: ERROR: No material with that name that I am aware of.
TooManyArguments: ERROR: Too many arguments used with this command.
NotEnoughArguments: ERROR: Not enough arguments used with this command.
InvalidArgCounter: ERROR: You passed the wrong number of arguments with this commands.
UnknownCrop: ERROR: I dont have the correct information to keep track of that type of crop growth, sorry!
UnknownReminderType: ERROR: I don't know how to set that kind of reminder.
